nodes.text: Garon Borm was a male Togruta Mandalorian Field Marshal who fought during the Mandalorian Wars. He also served as the commander of the Kandosii-type dreadnaught known as Parjai. When he attempted to stop Dorjander Kace's plan to take the Jedi younglings from the planet Dantooine, Zayne Carrick and the rest of the Republic prisoners were able trick Garon and his crew into thinking that there had been a "Jedi Brain fever", forcing the crew to leave the ship while the Republic prisoners took over it.
